name: Barbarian
description: Barbarians use their martial prowess and primal rage to strengthen themselves and dominate enemies in combat.

options.name: Berserker
options.description: Violence is both a means and an end. You follow a path of untrammeled fury, slick with blood, as you thrill in the chaos of battle, heedless of your own well-being.

options.name: Wild Magic
options.description: The wild influence of magic has transformed you, suffusing you with arcane power that churns within you, waiting to be released.

options.name: Wildheart
options.description: Your attunement with nature and its beasts inspires your rage, empowering you with supernatural might.

options.name: Berserker

options.name: Aspect of the Beast: Honey Badger

options.name: Wildheart

options.name: Aspect of the Beast: Honey Badger

name: Bard
description: Bards are expert storytellers, artists, and performers. Bards channel their power through song, speech, or performance to cast Spells. Bards use Charisma as their primary ability score.

options.name: College of Lore
options.description: You pursue beauty and truth, collecting knowledge from scholarly tomes to peasants' tales, and use your gifts to hold both audiences and enemies spellbound.

options.name: College of Swords
options.description: Bards of the College of Swords are called blades, and they entertain through daring feats of weapon prowess.

options.name: College of Valour
options.description: You wander the land to witness and relate the deeds of the mighty, keeping alive the memory of heroes of the past and inspiring heroes of the future.

options.name: College of Lore
options.description: You pursue beauty and truth, collecting knowledge from scholarly tomes to peasants' tales, and use your gifts to hold both audiences and enemies spellbound.

options.name: Magical Secrets
options.description: Your versatile knack for the arcane lets you learn magic from every discipline. Choose some additional spells to add to your repertoire.

options.name: College of Swords
options.description: Bards of the College of Swords are called blades, and they entertain through daring feats of weapon prowess.

options.name: College of Valour
options.description: You wander the land to witness and relate the deeds of the mighty, keeping alive the memory of heroes of the past and inspiring heroes of the future.

Features.name: Magical Secrets
Features.description: Your versatile knack for the arcane lets you learn magic from every discipline. Choose some additional spells to add to your repertoire.

name: Cleric
description: Clerics worship and enact their deities' will to the world, for better or worse. They channel the power of their faith to cast Spells. Clerics use Wisdom as their primary ability score.

options.name: Knowledge Domain
options.description: Adaptable and adroit in all manner of languages and skills, your mind is an intellectual cup brimming with exquisite knowing.

options.name: Life Domain
options.description: The Life domain is an aspect of many good deities, offering spells that protect and restore the mind, body, and soul.

options.name: Light Domain
options.description: The Light domain is offered by deities of justice, majesty, and primordial flame, providing spells that dispel darkness and harm the undead.

options.name: Nature Domain
options.description: You embody the vast viridian power of the natural world, an avatar of the subtle divinity of fruitfall, avian migration, woodland silence, and the landslide's roaring fury.

options.name: Tempest Domain
options.description: Your faith has made you the very thunder that quakes the black firmament, the lightning coursing through the veins of a terrible storm.

options.name: Trickery Domain
options.description: A domain shared by wicked, chaotic, and mischievous deities alike, those who channel Trickery specialise in deception and illusion magic.

options.name: War Domain
options.description: Fortified by holy zeal, you brandish an arsenal of sacramental savagery to use against those you deem unrighteous.

name: Druid
description: Druids are closely attuned with nature and the animals that live in it. They utilise the power of nature to cast Spells and have the ability to transform into various creatures. Druids use Wisdom as their primary ability score.

options.name: Circle of the Land
options.description: Druids of this Circle connect to powerful magic that flows through the earth and binds all living things together.

options.name: Circle of the Moon
options.description: Druids sworn to the moon draw on its mercurial nature to transform into massive creatures and primal elementals.

options.name: Circle of the Spores
options.description: Viewing death, necrosis, fungal growth, and sporulation as just another part of life, you can manipulate such spores to augment yourself and harm your foes.

options.name: Circle of the Land
options.description: Druids of this Circle connect to powerful magic that flows through the earth and binds all living things together.

options.name: 2nd Level Circle of the Land Spells

name: Fighter
description: Fighters use their martial expertise to fight enemies and support their allies in combat. Fighters use Strength or Dexterity as their primary ability score.

options.name: Battle Master
options.description: Battle Masters are paragons of tactical superiority, combining combat manoeuvres  and experience in the field to dominate every fight.

options.name: Champion
options.description: You approach the complex problems posed by combat with one distinctly effective solution - you hit those problems, really quite hard.

options.name: Eldritch Knight
options.description: Eldritch Knights study magic to supplement their weaponry, allowing them to overcome resistance from the toughest foes.
options.image: Class Fighter Eldritch Knight Badge Icon.png

name: Monk
description: Monks are unarmed combatants capable of spending Ki Points to perform special abilities. Monk's key ability scores are Wisdom, Dexterity, and Constitution, and their core ability is Unarmed Strike.

options.name: Way of Shadow
options.description: You value the arts of stealth and subterfuge, bending the shadows to your will to strike without warning.

options.name: Way of the Four Elements
options.description: You focus your ki to bend the elements to your will, using them as an extension of your own body.
options.image: Class Monk Four Elements Badge Icon.png

options.name: Way of the Open Hand
options.description: You specialise in unarmed combat, using your hands and control of ki to heal or inflict grievous hurt.
options.image: Class Monk Open Hand Badge Icon.png

options.name: Way of Shadow
options.description: You value the arts of stealth and subterfuge, bending the shadows to your will to strike without warning.

name: Paladin
description: Paladins are masters of a variety of weapons and armour. They channel the power of their sacred oath to heal the sick and injured and to smite their foes. Important Ability Scores for Paladins include Strength (or Dexterity), Charisma, and Constitution.

options.name: Oath of Devotion
options.description: Following the ideal of the knight in shining armour, you act with honour and virtue to protect the weak and pursue the greater good.

options.name: Oath of Vengeance
options.description: You have set aside even your own purity to right wrongs and deliver justice to those who have committed the most grievous sins.

options.name: Oath of the Ancients
options.description: You fight on the side of light in the cosmic struggle against darkness to preserve the sanctity of life and the beauty of nature.
options.image: Paladin Oath of the Ancients Icon.png

options.name: Oathbreaker
options.description: You have broken your sacred Oath in pursuit of power and ambition. Only darkness remains to fuel you now.

name: Ranger
description: In tune with nature and their surroundings, Rangers utilize both their knowledge of the wilds and spellcasting to pursue their prey. Important Ability Scores for Rangers include Dexterity (or Strength), Constitution, and Wisdom.

options.name: Beast Master
options.description: Beast Masters bind themselves to an animal companion, sharing an intelligent bond that flourishes in and out of combat.
options.image: Class Ranger Beast Master Badge Icon.png

options.name: Gloom Stalker
options.description: Emerging like a horrible gift from the envelope of darkness and shadow, you ambush and put down your foes before they can even scream.

options.name: Hunter
options.description: Hunters seek the most dangerous prey in Faern, from ancient dragons to massive hordes of undead, and excel at slaying them all.

options.name: Beast Master
options.description: Beast Masters bind themselves to an animal companion, sharing an intelligent bond that flourishes in and out of combat.
options.image: Class Ranger Beast Master Badge Icon.png

options.name: Hunter
options.description: Hunters seek the most dangerous prey in Faern, from ancient dragons to massive hordes of undead, and excel at slaying them all.

name: Rogue
description: Rogues are well versed in the art of stealth and rely on their resourcefulness to be in control of any challenging situation. Rogues use Dexterity as their primary ability score.

options.name: Arcane Trickster
options.description: Arcane Tricksters are rogues with a clever touch of magic, using illusions and enchantments to keep their opponents on the back foot.

options.name: Assassin
options.description: You prefer to deal sublime punishment to a single foe at a time - not in a duel, mind, because a duel implies chivalry, and you're too busy getting the job done for honour.

options.name: Thief
options.description: Thieves use their skills in stealth and larceny to acquire whatever they wish, whether from a third story window or the depths of long-forgotten ruins.

options.name: Arcane Trickster
options.description: Arcane Tricksters are rogues with a clever touch of magic, using illusions and enchantments to keep their opponents on the back foot.

options.name: Thief

name: Sorcerer
description: Sorcerers use their innate magical powers to fight enemies and aid allies in combat. Sorcerers use Charisma as their primary ability score.

options.name: Draconic Bloodline
options.description: Your veins carry draconic magic, the result of a powerful dragon ancestor.
options.image: Class Sorcerer Draconic Bloodline Badge Icon.png

options.name: Storm Sorcery
options.description: Whether crackling with the energy of ancient deluges or pierced by gales and hurricanes, your lineage is a strange tapestry scrawled by a tempest.

options.name: Wild Magic
options.description: Your powers come from ancient forces of chaos. They churn within you -- waiting to burst free at any time.
options.image: Class Sorcerer Wild Magic Badge Icon.png

options.name: Draconic Bloodline
options.description: Your veins carry draconic magic, the result of a powerful dragon ancestor.
options.image: Class Sorcerer Draconic Bloodline Badge Icon.png

options.name: Storm Sorcery

options.image: Class Sorcerer Wild Magic Badge Icon.png

name: Warlock
description: Warlocks channel their patron's pact magic to fight enemies and aid allies in combat. Warlocks use Charisma as their primary ability score.

options.name: The Archfey
options.description: Graced by a lady or lord of the fey, you are imbued with all the sumptuous and scary qualities of your patron's extraordinary realm.

options.name: The Fiend
options.description: You have pledged your soul to the Hells or Abyss in return for a deadly arsenal of fiendish arcana.

options.name: The Great Old One
options.description: You pledged something unthinkable to an unspeakably ancient entity - which in return furnished you with powers of cerebral entropy and control.
options.image: Class Warlock Great Old One Badge Icon.png

options.name: The Archfey
options.description: Graced by a lady or lord of the fey, you are imbued with all the sumptuous and scary qualities of your patron's extraordinary realm.

options.name: The Great Old One
options.description: You pledged something unthinkable to an unspeakably ancient entity - which in return furnished you with powers of cerebral entropy and control.
options.image: Class Warlock Great Old One Badge Icon.png

Features.name: Deepened Pact
Features.description: Pleased with your service, your otherworldly patron added new boons to the terms of your pact.

options.name: Pact of the Blade (passive feature)
options.description: Gain an Extra Attack with your pact weapon.

options.name: Pact of the Chain
options.description: Your familiar gains an Extra Attack.

options.name: Pact of the Tome
options.description: You can cast Animate Dead, Haste, and Call Lightning once per Long Rest.

options.name: The Archfey
options.description: Graced by a lady or lord of the fey, you are imbued with all the sumptuous and scary qualities of your patron's extraordinary realm.

options.name: The Fiend
options.description: You have pledged your soul to the Hells or Abyss in return for a deadly arsenal of fiendish arcana.

Features.name: Mystic Arcanum
Features.description: Your patron bestows upon you a magical secret called an arcanum. Choose one 6th Level spell from the Warlock Spell list. You can cast your arcanum spell once without expending a spell slot. You must finish a Long Rest before you can do so again.

name: Wizard
description: Wizards channel magic through their extensive knowledge of the arcane to fight enemies and aid allies in combat. Wizards use Intelligence as their primary ability score.

options.name: Abjuration School
options.description: Abjuration spells summon wards, banish enemies, and nullify magic, suitable for those who wish to defend themselves and others.

options.name: Conjuration School
options.description: Compelled by shape and motion, your favoured arcane style involves summoning creatures and objects, as well as displacing them in space.

options.name: Divination School
options.description: You peer through time itself and can sculpt the future, like temporal clay, into a more favourable form.

options.name: Enchantment School
options.description: Your magic influences, beguiles, and bends the will and conviction of those around you.

options.name: Evocation School
options.description: Evocation spells focus elemental energy into powerful attacks and enchantments. Those who specialise in this school are known as evokers.

options.name: Illusion School
options.description: You specialise in unravelling and restitching the fabric of reality to fool the unwary, the gullible, and the monstrous.

options.name: Necromancy School
options.description: You walk through the valley of the shadow of death, and make lots of friends there.

options.name: Transmutation School
options.description: Your innate fascination with the structure of things has granted you an incredible power over crude matter and its manipulation.
